reviews.content: Tampa General is a great facility with reputable and knowledge doctors. . However, expect to spend about 15 minutes on hold whenever you call just to make an appointment. It seems it doesn't matter the time of day you call, you'll be on hold waiting to make an appointment at least 15 minutes.

I take a relative here who has had a fantasic break through in treatment,which several other practices had failed to deliver.As for the receptionist,I have NEVER head her be more than professional and extremely kind and well mannered.Perhaps the other review is indicative of that persons lack of even a single friend

I went there for the first time recently.  As someone new to the area, I found the practice welcoming and professional.  I was able to be seen within two days to establish with a doctor.  I like that they have an open house every week to meet the doctors and ask questions before deciding if you want to be a patient there.

They really ought to take a look at their office staff. The doc can be great, but when your receptionist yells at patients over the phone because she is "stressed out because it's so busy and the phones won't stop ringing", patients are going to leave the practice.
